page.title: 15CHILD'S DAY IN OWERMOIGNE
page.content: I WOKE UP,PUT ON MY PANTS,SOCKS,SHIRT AND TROUSERS,WASHED MY FACE AND CLEANED MY TEETH,THEN I PLAYED ON MY COMPUTER.AT 8.30 AFTER MY BREAKFAST OF CORNFLAKES I WENT TO THE BUS STOP.AT SCHOOL I PUT MY BAG ON MY PEG MRS TAYLOR TOOK REGISTER THEN WE WENT TO ASSEMBLY.AFTER THAT WAS A MATHS TABLES TEST.IN PLAYTIME I RAN INVASION ON THE COMPUTER THEN WE PLAYED PIRATES IN THE GYM.FOR LUNCH I HAD YOGHURT AND A MARS BAR, THEN I PLAYED VOLLEY BALL.BACK IN CLASS WE WROTE A STORY ABOUT LIFE ON A FARM.AFTER A GAME OF ROUNDERS MY MOTHER CAME TO PICK ME UP FROM SCHOOL. WHEN I GOT HOME I HAD MY TEA,PLAYED OUTSIDE FOR A WHILE AND THEN I WENT TO BED AT ABOUT 8.30. {BY WILLIAM ANDREWS } {AGE 9}
